name: Chaos Tao
body:
### Chaos Tao ---- "Chaos Tao" is pieces of generative or algorithmic music. It generates a series midi sequences in real time, then play them out and output the midi notes. ### Author Contra @avantcontra
------- ##### Chaos The algorithm behind is "[Chaos](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chaos)". ##### Pure Data Programming Language is `Pure Data (Pd vanilla)`, using `WebPd` to play in web browser. [WebPd](https://github.com/sebpiq/WebPd) is a 100% JavaScript `Pure Data` runtime using [Web Audio API](http://webaudio.github.io/web-audio-api/) to play audio in the browser.
[Pure Data (aka Pd)](http://puredata.info/) is an open source visual programming language. ##### Reference
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
